metadata.title: Does the RA2 series integrate Arm® TrustZone® ?

sections.content:
Question:
Does the RA2 series integrate Arm® TrustZone® ? 
Answer:
No.  Arm® TrustZone® function is not available in the RA2 series.
Suitable Products
RA2L1, RA2A1, RA2E1, RA2E2, RA2E3, RA2A2
